website_summaries.verdict: OCZ's Vertex 3 is the fastest consumer solid-state drive in the 256GB capacity range. But it will cost you.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, Fast...
customer_reviews.text: This was an Amazon Prime purchase that arrived in 48 hours, took 5 minutes [from beginning to end] to install in my home-pc build, and has been working error-free [albeit for the few days I have owned the product]. I have not tested read-write speeds via benchmarking tools such as AS SSD Benchmark, but am satisfied with performance gains over my 2010 WD Caviar Black HDD's performance. I also have an OCZ 240 gb SSD installed in my laptop and to date have had no substantial issues with OCZ performance in my devices. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: 2Kidznamortgage

customer_reviews.title: I. will never. use a regular hard drive ...
customer_reviews.text: I. will never. use a regular hard drive.. again. Put your operating system on this puppy and use the rusty platters for storage. You'll never have a speed issue. I've had this unit for well over a year and I'm having no issues with it.. and I haven't even updated the firmware.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Low star reviews are out of date and misleading
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased two of these drives; Both shipped with the latest (10/05/12 - 2.25) firmware, which has long since resolved the problems which troubled this drive. Don't be afraid of the one star reviews, the drive is now problem-free. If you're looking for the latest and greatest, this isn't it. If you're looking for a good deal to spruce up an aging computer, this is a great deal ($90 currently).
customer_reviews.author: C. Tasker

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Installed it in my 24" imac. Works like a charm and the difference is simply unbelievable. My imac only has SATAII so I'm obviously not pushing the SSD to its limit and can't compare it well to other SATAIII drives.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Blazing fast speeds and easy to install (In a MacBook Pro laptop)
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my main hard drive on my MacBook Pro with this SSD. Although it may not be the largest drive, it is more than sufficient for the operating system along with all my applications. The laptop boots in about 8 seconds from a cold start and programs open up extremely rapidly as well. A great product with a consumer friendly price.
customer_reviews.author: Yann Lemasson

customer_reviews.title: Buy now it delivers on all promises
customer_reviews.text: Look at the specs and you know it is what you want. I took the plunge and I love this drive. We all know marketing type will stretch the claims, I tested this in my world and I offer my humble opinion. THIS ROCKS!!! Looking to breath new life into an old friend? Clone and go. Want a computer that is waiting on you? Your new friend is waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Black

customer_reviews.title: Nice fast controller and IOPS to.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use this for just Microsoft Windows 8.1 install. But; many things I installed filled the 120 gig space up very fast. Use it in my new computer as second drive, About a month after I bought it Vertex 4 came out, then 'Barefoot controller' came out.
customer_reviews.author: RAL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: This product is blazing fast and I shaved off a LOT of time on boot and the bigger games load much faster on this drive compared to my RAID0 array.
customer_reviews.author: duelistgamer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a month then failed. OCZ were MOST UNHELPFUL with warranty, received it back after a couple of months, NOT FIXED. Very disappointed... Have been buying INTEL since then...... no failures, no problems. Note... Other OCZ SSD's that I have are working OK.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: just as discribed. works great.
customer_reviews.text: So have had it for over a week. Have no problems with it at all. My computer stays on 24/7, i have a i7 2600k at 4.5 ghz on a msi mobo. benched the hd i get. 569 read speed and 511 write speed. Before this i was using two hdds in raid 0.. this is so much faster! When i got it .. i stuck it in my computer.. updated to lastest firemware i guess its called.. rebooted set bios settings then installed windows.. works great!
customer_reviews.author: rotatez

customer_reviews.title: Best SSDs
customer_reviews.text: Any reviews giving it 1 star due to bsod are now irrelevant. FW 2.15 and higher have completely fixed the bsod issue. I have 2 120gb of these running in RAID0 and getting almost 1gb/s read & write.
customer_reviews.author: Marat2k6

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speed increase on system launch time on my macbook pro. Works even better for editing films and photos. Definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: JP Braga

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The drive is fast, and I haven't had any issues. For the price I paid, it is turning out to be a great drive.

customer_reviews.title: FAST
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Solid State drive. Super fast. A bit small in storage size but good to put your OS on it. Quality made item.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: repeat failures of this drive, don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for about a year. I restored a Windows 7 x64 disk image from a few days previous and the SSD failed catastrophically. The PC would not even get past the BIOS recognition of the SSD. Unplugged it, put the image on a mechanical hard drive and all was well. Except for the drive, which was RMA'd. Fast forward to three months later, new example of the same drive with latest firmware. Exact same thing happened. Restored a disk image and the SSD failed, locking up the BIOS at hard drive detection. Do your research, OCZ appears to be the least reliable of all manufacturers!
customer_reviews.author: Lifespeed

customer_reviews.title: Great drive but needs work
customer_reviews.text: The drive came unstable. Random BSOD's every 4 hours. I had no idea it was the drive at first but then traced the problem to it. You need to do the registry edit, enable hot plugging, and upgrade the firmware (I had to do a reinstall of the OS since it can't update firmware if the OS is installed on it). After all that, the drive is finally stable. This drive is like a really hot psycho-chick, they are great when you got them under control, but they are a pain till then.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C. Beckmann

customer_reviews.title: Fast HD Very much Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: A lot of ppl are complaining about this drive and that it often causes BSOD. I learned when I bought and installed mine that if you dont set your BIOS SATA Mode to AHCI then you will experience BSOD. This hard drive is working perfect and fast in my system. I would highly recommend this drive to anyone looking to buy and SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Screams
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, working great now for a couple months, just be sure to re-assign your internal drive as the startup drive after copying your system to the SSD externally, then when you switch out the drives the new SSD inside will boot quickly. Otherwise the system looks for the external drive to boot from and this takes a lot more time and defeats the purpose of having the fast-loading SSD... It was expensive but great to know it was invested in just about the fastest and longest-lasing SSD available.
customer_reviews.author: trailfan

customer_reviews.title: Very fast SSD
customer_reviews.text: Very fast. Windows boots up in 5 secs. Using it for a month now and no problems. Will get another to create RAID 0 for even faster performance.
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: SuperFast but crashes constantly
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this drive. Its very unstable and wont work. My system wont stay up for more than 24 hours with this SSD. Swap to HDD problem goes away. tech support is not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Home Theater Geek

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: When I installed Vista 64bit it took a long time. Once installed, drive worked intermitantly for 1 day. 2nd day it took 2 to 3 boots just for bios to recognize a SSD was installed. 3rd day totally dead. I installed my old Kingston SSD no problems.
customer_reviews.author: leadman

customer_reviews.title: no problem here
customer_reviews.text: I've had this drive in production for over a year now, never had any problem at all. I think this "enterprise" SSD is not subject to high failure rates.

customer_reviews.title: my laptop is much faster than before
customer_reviews.text: After installing this OCZ SSD, the booting time of my laptop decreases tremendously. The original time for booting is about 10 seconds, now it is 2-3 seconds. Running programs is much faster than before. I really like SSD. If your have enough budget, you should try SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

As the first SSD to feature the latest Sandforce controller design, OCZ designed the Vertex 3 to push the limits in both sequential and random read/write rates to blaze past the competition when every MB/s matters. with incredible 4k file writes up to 75, 000 IOPS, these latest drives take productivity, gaming, and multimedia applications to the next level to work in perfect symmetry with the latest enthusiast platforms.
